ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM.synopsis: Shadowheart meets with her parents once again, who have been imprisoned for decades. A vision of Shar appears and demands Shadowheart sacrifice her parents.Note: there are two major tracks in this scene - if SH comes to it as a loyal Sharran who is intent on taking control of the church at her goddess's command, or as someone who has turned from Shar and is coming to rescue her parents.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to grotto with shadowheart2. Talk to Viconia3. Beat Viconia4. Go to Chamber of Loss6. Talk to Parents

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM.synopsis: Shadowheart confronts Viconia about her past and potentially the leadership of the cult itself. Alternatively, she may just seek to fight her former mistress in order to free her parents, should she know they're alive.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM.how_to_trigger: 1. Enter the grotto with Shadowheart as avatar or just with Shadowheart2. Approach Viconia3. Dialog starts

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM.synopsis: Avatar Shadowheart meets with her parents once again, who have been imprisoned for decades. A vision of Shar appears and demands Shadowheart sacrifice her parents.Note: there are two major tracks in this scene - if SH comes to it as a loyal Sharran who is intent on taking control of the church at her goddess's command, or as someone who has turned from Shar and is coming to rescue her parents.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to grotto with shadowheart2. Talk to Viconia3. Beat Viconia4. Talk to Viconia5. Go to Chamber of Loss6. Talk to Parents

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM.synopsis: Shadowheart confronts Viconia about her past and potentially the leadership of the cult itself. Alternatively, she may be here to free her parents, if she has abandoned Shar. The player can support her efforts and help her defeat Viconia, or else betray her.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM.how_to_trigger: 1. Enter the grotto with Shadowheart2. Approach Viconia3. Dialog starts

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM.synopsis: Shadowheart deals with Viconia after she has been defeated. Different flows for Shar Path and Enemy of Shar path.
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to the grotto with Shadowheart2. Talk to Viconia3. Win the fight4. Talk to her with Shadowheart nearby

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM.synopsis: Shadowheart meets with her old friend once again. Talking about the past and discussing what the future is going to look like.
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM.how_to_trigger: 1. Go with shadowheart to the grotto2. Talk to Nightshade.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM.synopsis: Shadowheart deals with Viconia after she has been defeated. Shadowheart could have come here to lead a coup against Viconia and seize control of the Shar Grotto, or she could have turned from her faith and have come here to rescue her captive parents.
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to the grotto with Shadowheart2. Talk to Viconia3. Win the fight4. Talk to her with Shadowheart nearby

MemoryRecovery_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM.synopsis: Shadowheart attempts to reunite with her memories, which will either embrace or deny her. Depending on if she has embraced Shar or rejected her.
MemoryRecovery_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM.how_to_trigger: 1. Enter Shar's Domain with Shadowheart2. Talk to Young Shadowheart

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM.synopsis: Shadowheart meets with her old friend once again. Talking about the past and discussing what the future is going to look like. ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_75.text: It can't be. Another vile trick -

(This should be reminiscent of the figure SH glimpsed in Shar's symbol during her vision after killing Nightsong). The elf man lifts his head to see Shadowheart and reacts with disbelief. His disc flares. He breaks off with a cry of pain.NodeContext: Disbelieving. Cut off at the end by a flare of magically triggered pain

Path 1: Shadowheart comes to this scene as a loyal Sharran who is intent on taking control of the church at her goddess’s command. She's found herself being commanded to sacrifice her long-lost parents.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_111.context: CinematicNodeContext: The chamber seems to grow darker suddenly. Shadowheart sees a vast silhouette of Shar leaning over her and her parents, in the same pose that the huge Shar statue at the centre of her temple in act 2 took (left hand underneath the floor as if holding up SH and co on a platter, right hand angling the tip of a sword towards SH and co, elbow back and head slightly tilted to her left) Shar's features cannot be clearly seen, but her words reverberate through SH's head.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_160.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_160.text: This was my gift to you. Power is not created; it merely changes from one form to another. Their pain becomes your might. Their suffering furthers your glory.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_160.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shar lowers the sword arm (right arm) out of view and gazes intently down at SH and co. Left arm still appears to be holding them up.NodeContext: Shar pose -starts with left hand underneath the floor as if holding up SH and co on a platter, right hand angling the tip of a sword towards SH and co, elbow back and head slightly tilted to her left. Then lowers the sword arm to her side (out of view for player) and stands looming over SH and co, left hand still appearing to hold them up.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_27.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_27.text: It is done. And done well. They are with me now, in my endless dark. And from them, you can draw endless power.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_27.context: NodeContext: Proud, triumphant. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_24.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_24.context: CinematicNodeContext: SH is on her kneesNodeContext: Dazed shock after killing her parents. ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_118.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_118.text: No longer. Forget. Forget and rise.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_118.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The dark aura fades.

Shadowheart blinks, the shocked expression slipping from her face. She stands and gives the player a look.
NodeContext: Proud, triumphant. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_41.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_41.text: It's done. This place is mine now. Shar's forces are mine, when I need them. And her power... it's right at my fingertips. I can't believe it.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_41.context: NodeContext: clear-minded and euphoric. Forgotten that she's just killed her parentsPath 1: Shadowheart comes to this scene as a loyal Sharran who is intent on taking control of the church at her goddess’s command. She's found herself being commanded to sacrifice her long-lost parents.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_71.speaker: Player
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_71.text: I can - you killed your parents for this.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_132.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_132.text: Don't be ridiculous - I never knew my parents. Whoever these poor wretches were, they're strangers to me.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_132.context: NodeContext: Disbelieving. Forgotten that she's just killed her parentsPath 1: Shadowheart comes to this scene as a loyal Sharran who is intent on taking control of the church at her goddess’s command. She's found herself being commanded to sacrifice her long-lost parents.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_177.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_177.text: It's time we left. We're not finished with the Absolute just yet. Only now, Shar's forces are mine to command, when the battle comes.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_177.context: NodeContext: Full of resolve. Path 1: Shadowheart comes to this scene as a loyal Sharran who is intent on taking control of the church at her goddess’s command. She's found herself being commanded to sacrifice her long-lost parents.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_23.speaker: Player
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_23.text: Those two corpses - do you know who they are?

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_172.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_172.text: Sacrifices. My final test, whoever they are. A rather meagre offering to the Dark Lady... but it is not my place to question her.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_172.context: NodeContext: Dismissive. Path 1: Shadowheart comes to this scene as a loyal Sharran who is intent on taking control of the church at her goddess’s command. She's found herself being commanded to sacrifice her long-lost parents.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_30.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_30.text: Yes. But we're not finished with the Absolute just yet. Only now, Lady Shar's forces are mine to command, when the battle comes.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_30.context: NodeContext: Full of resolve. Path 1: Shadowheart comes to this scene as a loyal Sharran who is intent on taking control of the church at her goddess’s command. She's found herself being commanded to sacrifice her long-lost parents.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_52.speaker: Player
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_52.text: It's not worth it. Shar will turn on you in time, same as she did Viconia.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_170.speaker: Player
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_170.text: They're your parents. They'll forgive you.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_106.speaker: Player
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_106.text: Do whatever you feel is right, Shadowheart.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_157.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_157.text: What's right... Have I ever known what that truly is?
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_157.context: NodeContext: Pensive/conflicted. Path 1: Shadowheart comes to this scene as a loyal Sharran who is intent on taking control of the church at her goddess’s command. She's found herself being commanded to sacrifice her long-lost parents.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_1.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_1.text: Do what's right. I think I lost sight of that some time ago. Better to just serve blindly.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_1.context: NodeContext: Fatalistic. Path 1: Shadowheart comes to this scene as a loyal Sharran who is intent on taking control of the church at her goddess’s command. She's found herself being commanded to sacrifice her long-lost parents.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_184.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_184.text: It can't be. Another vile trick...
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_184.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart approaches two upright discs upon which an elf man and human woman are restrained to each. (This should be reminiscent of the figure SH glimpsed in Shar's symbol during her vision after killing Nightsong). The elf man lifts his head to see Shadowheart and reacts with disbelief. His disc flares. He breaks off with a cry of pain.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_31.speaker: Emmeline Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_31.text: No... there is no trick. It's her. Jenevelle. Jen. Our little girl.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_63.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_63.text: I'm here to get you out of here. They're all gone, it's over -
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_63.context: NodeContext: Urgent, cut off by a wince of pain at the end. Path 2: Shadowheart comes to this scene as someone who has turned from Shar and is seeking to rescue her parents - only Shar remains spiteful and is intent on tainting the reunion with a terrible dilemma.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_174.context: CinematicNodeContext: A dark aura pulses from the black mirror, casting shadows throughout the chamber. Shadowheart doubles over in pain as her incurable wound flares intensely. Her parents also writhe in agony. Finally it abates and Shadowheart straightens - to see a vast silhouette of Shar leaning over her and her parents. Shar's features cannot be clearly seen, but her words reverberate through SH's head.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_166.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_166.context: CinematicNodeContext:  Shadowheart doubles over in pain as her incurable wound flares intensely. Her parents also writhe in agony on their disc-restaints. Finally it abates and Shadowheart standsNodeContext: Cold, imperious (Shadowheart is out of favour with Shar). Then lowers the sword arm to her side (out of view for player) and stands looming over SH and co, left hand still appearing to hold them up.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_158.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_158.text: You see? It matters not if you raze this place, if you slay every one of your brothers and sisters. That was never where my power resided.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_158.context: NodeContext: Cold, imperious (Shadowheart is out of favour with Shar). Shar pose -starts with left hand underneath the floor as if holding up SH and co on a platter, right hand angling the tip of a sword towards SH and co, elbow back and head slightly tilted to her left. Then lowers the sword arm to her side (out of view for player) and stands looming over SH and co, left hand still appearing to hold them up.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_108.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_108.text: Every time you try to step away from me, every time you try to reach for Selûne, my hold on you bites deeper.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_108.context: NodeContext: (Selûne = seh-LOO-nuh)Cold, imperious (Shadowheart is out of favour with Shar). Shar pose -starts with left hand underneath the floor as if holding up SH and co on a platter, right hand angling the tip of a sword towards SH and co, elbow back and head slightly tilted to her left. Then lowers the sword arm to her side (out of view for player) and stands looming over SH and co, left hand still appearing to hold them up.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_55.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_55.text: If you had learned, if you had obeyed, there would be no pain. But you struggle on. You make things worse for yourself. And for them.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_55.context: NodeContext: Cold, imperious (Shadowheart is out of favour with Shar). Shar pose -starts with left hand underneath the floor as if holding up SH and co on a platter, right hand angling the tip of a sword towards SH and co, elbow back and head slightly tilted to her left. Then lowers the sword arm to her side (out of view for player) and stands looming over SH and co, left hand still appearing to hold them up.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_67.speaker: Player
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_67.text: You're a monster, not a goddess.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_2.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_2.text: I am neither. I am nothing. I am the empty room. The dreamless sleep. The shadow's shadow.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_2.context: NodeContext: Cold, imperious (Shadowheart is out of favour with Shar). Shar pose -starts with left hand underneath the floor as if holding up SH and co on a platter, right hand angling the tip of a sword towards SH and co, elbow back and head slightly tilted to her left. Then lowers the sword arm to her side (out of view for player) and stands looming over SH and co, left hand still appearing to hold them up.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_149.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_149.text: There was no pain before my sister set the sun aflame. Now you exist to suffer, until you find your way back to my embrace.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_149.context: NodeContext: Cold, imperious (Shadowheart is out of favour with Shar). Shar pose -starts with left hand underneath the floor as if holding up SH and co on a platter, right hand angling the tip of a sword towards SH and co, elbow back and head slightly tilted to her left. Then lowers the sword arm to her side (out of view for player) and stands looming over SH and co, left hand still appearing to hold them up.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_105.speaker: Player
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_105.text: Ignore her, Shadowheart. She's just trying to spite your victory.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_123.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_123.text: Victory? Your victory is but a guttering candle in the dark. Temporary. Inconsequential.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_123.context: NodeContext: Cold, imperious (Shadowheart is out of favour with Shar). Shar pose -starts with left hand underneath the floor as if holding up SH and co on a platter, right hand angling the tip of a sword towards SH and co, elbow back and head slightly tilted to her left. Then lowers the sword arm to her side (out of view for player) and stands looming over SH and co, left hand still appearing to hold them up.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_18.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_18.text: Enough. I'm taking my parents away from here. I'm taking them away from you.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_18.context: NodeContext: Defiant. Path 2: Shadowheart comes to this scene as someone who has turned from Shar and is seeking to rescue her parents - only Shar remains spiteful and is intent on tainting the reunion with a terrible dilemma.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_12.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_12.text: You cannot. We are still bound to you. You cannot both free us and free yourself from her curse.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_47.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_47.text: The Moonmaiden needs you more than she needs us. You are the future - you must return to the fold. We are the past. And our duty is almost done.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_122.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_122.text: Eloquently put. His mind stood up well to his time here. The same cannot be said for your mother - such brief, fragile lives humans lead.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_122.context: NodeContext: Cold, imperious (Shadowheart is out of favour with Shar). Shar pose -starts with left hand underneath the floor as if holding up SH and co on a platter, right hand angling the tip of a sword towards SH and co, elbow back and head slightly tilted to her left. Then lowers the sword arm to her side (out of view for player) and stands looming over SH and co, left hand still appearing to hold them up.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_142.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_142.text: This is my final lesson. I leave you now, to dwell on your mistakes and make your choice.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_142.context: NodeContext: Cold, imperious (Shadowheart is out of favour with Shar). Shar pose -starts with left hand underneath the floor as if holding up SH and co on a platter, right hand angling the tip of a sword towards SH and co, elbow back and head slightly tilted to her left. Then lowers the sword arm to her side (out of view for player) and stands looming over SH and co, left hand still appearing to hold them up.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_159.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shar's silhouette melts away and the dark Shadowfell aura fades. The room is as it was before.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_173.speaker: Narrator
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_173.text: *Shar's parting words make your flesh crawl. There is no lesson to be learned here - only a family's torment, a spiteful goddess' whims, and an unspeakable choice to be made...*

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_11.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_11.context: NodeContext: Confused. Path 2: Shadowheart comes to this scene as someone who has turned from Shar and is seeking to rescue her parents - only Shar remains spiteful and is intent on tainting the reunion with a terrible dilemma.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_162.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_162.text: Shar will never admit defeat - not until she has stolen one last thing from you. We cannot allow your future to be her last prize - not after all your mother and I have endured to see you again.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_49.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_49.text: You companion understands, I think. Help her, please. Help her see what must be done.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_49.context: CinematicNodeContext: Glances from SH to player to share a look of understandingNodeContext: Referring to player while addressing SH for first line. Addressing player with the second. A solemn, dignified plea.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_37.speaker: Player
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_37.text: You have to choose, Shadowheart. Free your parents, or rid yourself of Shar's curse.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_46.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_46.text: No, I can't. I came here for them.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_46.context: NodeContext: Shock/dismay. Path 2: Shadowheart comes to this scene as someone who has turned from Shar and is seeking to rescue her parents - only Shar remains spiteful and is intent on tainting the reunion with a terrible dilemma.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_150.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_150.text: And you did. You found us.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_81.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_81.text: All these years, that dream kept us going, that you would break free. No matter what they made you do to us, we knew you were still in there.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_6.speaker: Emmeline Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_6.text: I knew the dark woods wouldn't frighten you. You were always such a brave girl.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_80.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_80.text: She was. And still is. You've saved us. Now save yourself. You'll be out of Shar's reach, and we'll be at peace.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_192.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_192.text: But I only just found you again, after all this time. I can't lose you again.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_192.context: NodeContext: Rising emotion/upset. Path 2: Shadowheart comes to this scene as someone who has turned from Shar and is seeking to rescue her parents - only Shar remains spiteful and is intent on tainting the reunion with a terrible dilemma.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_181.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_181.text: We'll still be with you. By the Moonmaiden's grace, we'll never be far. Please, Jenevelle.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_65.speaker: Player
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_65.text: You should end their suffering, and yours.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_83.speaker: Player
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_83.text: Do not lose your parents, not again. The pain can be handled.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_74.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_74.text: But the curse. We'll just have to go on like this... suffering.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_74.context: NodeContext: Unsure/overwhelmed. Path 2: Shadowheart comes to this scene as someone who has turned from Shar and is seeking to rescue her parents - only Shar remains spiteful and is intent on tainting the reunion with a terrible dilemma.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_42.speaker: Player
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_42.text: You have great faith and great resolve - all of you. Trust in that. You need not say goodbye here.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_25.speaker: Player
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_25.text: You can endure it together, as a family. This is what you've been looking for - don't deny yourself.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_62.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_62.text: I didn't come this far just to give up at the final hurdle. We're leaving this place together. I'm going to take care of you.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_62.context: NodeContext: Defiant/resolved. Path 2: Shadowheart comes to this scene as someone who has turned from Shar and is seeking to rescue her parents - only Shar remains spiteful and is intent on tainting the reunion with a terrible dilemma.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_189.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_189.text: Our time has passed, Jenevelle. You must not let us burden you.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_3.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_3.text: You're no burden. You're my strength. I think I know where my wilful side comes from now.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_129.speaker: Emmeline Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_129.text: Hush, Arnell. Jen wants her family. Jen shall have her family. How can we help, dear?

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_98.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart's hand begins to glow with Selûnite power. It intensifies, engulfing her and her parents. The player turns away... the glow fades. The sharran discs have vanished. SH's parents are now free of their restraints, weak on their feet. Shadowheart embraces them gently.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_109.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_109.text: Get out of this place, as soon as your strength allows. There's a camp - you'll be safe there.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_64.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_64.text: I'm sorry... I need to obey my parents' wishes, this once. If you are sure this is what you want...?
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_64.context: NodeContext: Resigned. First sentence addressed to player. 'If you are sure this is what you want...?' addressed to parents. Path 2: Shadowheart comes to this scene as someone who has turned from Shar and is seeking to rescue her parents - only Shar remains spiteful and is intent on tainting the reunion with a terrible dilemma.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_69.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_69.text: It is what we need, all of us.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_9.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_9.text: You were meant to be a guiding light for Selûne's faithful, but they robbed you from us. Now that can be righted, and we can rest.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_96.speaker: Emmeline Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_96.text: Help us, Jen. I can let go, now I've seen your face again.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_113.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_113.context: NodeContext: Choking up. About to euthanize her parents. Path 2: Shadowheart comes to this scene as someone who has turned from Shar and is seeking to rescue her parents - only Shar remains spiteful and is intent on tainting the reunion with a terrible dilemma.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_19.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart's hand begins to glow with Selûnite power. It intensifies, engulfing her and her parents. The player turns away...

... the glow fades. Shadowheart's parents are gone. In their place are two floating motes of light. They dance gently in the air before Shadowheart. She smiles at them.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_126.speaker: Player
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_126.text: I'm sorry that it came to this.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_54.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_54.text: Don't be. They're free now, as am I. And part of them is still here with me.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_54.context: NodeContext: At peace after giving her parents the death they asked for. Path 2: Shadowheart comes to this scene as someone who has turned from Shar and is seeking to rescue her parents - only Shar remains spiteful and is intent on tainting the reunion with a terrible dilemma.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_17.context: CinematicNodeContext: The moon motes flit away offscreen as if guiding her out of the chamber.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_102.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_102.text: Let's leave this place. There's nothing more for me here.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_102.context: NodeContext: At peace after giving her parents the death they asked for. Path 2: Shadowheart comes to this scene as someone who has turned from Shar and is seeking to rescue her parents - only Shar remains spiteful and is intent on tainting the reunion with a terrible dilemma.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_187.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_187.text: I don't know where home is anymore... but it's not here.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_187.context: NodeContext: Spoken with some finality. Her journey against Shar is done. Path 2: Shadowheart comes to this scene as someone who has turned from Shar and is seeking to rescue her parents - only Shar remains spiteful and is intent on tainting the reunion with a terrible dilemma.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_43.speaker: Player
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_43.text: One thing - what should I call you now? Shadowheart? Jenevelle?

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_146.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_146.text: Shadowheart, still. I can't run away from who I was for all this time. Besides, there's something fitting to it - you can't cast a shadow without some light.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_146.context: NodeContext: Thoughtful, at peace with herself. Path 2: Shadowheart comes to this scene as someone who has turned from Shar and is seeking to rescue her parents - only Shar remains spiteful and is intent on tainting the reunion with a terrible dilemma.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_4.speaker: Player
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_4.text: What about your memories? Isn't there more that was taken from you?

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_91.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_91.text: More? Most, I should think. I doubt Shar will be given over to generosity... Best if I just consider them lost. I have everything I need to make new memories. As for this place, all I did here...
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_91.context: NodeContext: Path 2: Shadowheart comes to this scene as someone who has turned from Shar and is seeking to rescue her parents - only Shar remains spiteful and is intent on tainting the reunion with a terrible dilemma.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_196.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_196.context: NodeContext: Spoken with some finality. Her journey against Shar is done. Path 2: Shadowheart comes to this scene as someone who has turned from Shar and is seeking to rescue her parents - only Shar remains spiteful and is intent on tainting the reunion with a terrible dilemma.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_178.speaker: Player
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_178.text: They are with the Moonmaiden now.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_104.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_104.text: In a way. But they're also right here - look.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_104.context: NodeContext: At peace after giving her parents the death they asked for. Path 2: Shadowheart comes to this scene as someone who has turned from Shar and is seeking to rescue her parents - only Shar remains spiteful and is intent on tainting the reunion with a terrible dilemma.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_156.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_156.text: Moon motes. They bring Selûne's light to dark places and offer guidance to those in need.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_156.context: CinematicNodeContext: SH looks at the surrounding moon motes dancing aroundNodeContext: (Selûne = seh-LOO-nuh) At peace after giving her parents the death they asked for. Path 2: Shadowheart comes to this scene as someone who has turned from Shar and is seeking to rescue her parents - only Shar remains spiteful and is intent on tainting the reunion with a terrible dilemma.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_58.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_58.text: My parents are watching over me.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_58.context: CinematicNodeContext: SH smiles at the motes. NodeContext: At peace after giving her parents the death they asked for. Path 2: Shadowheart comes to this scene as someone who has turned from Shar and is seeking to rescue her parents - only Shar remains spiteful and is intent on tainting the reunion with a terrible dilemma.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_154.speaker: Player
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_154.text: You forced Lady Shar's hand and paid the price. I hope your freedom is worth it.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_110.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_110.text: To be free of Shar? To end my parents' suffering and show them it wasn't all in vain?
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_110.context: NodeContext: Defiant - she's cut ties with Shar forever. Path 2: Shadowheart comes to this scene as someone who has turned from Shar and is seeking to rescue her parents - only Shar remains spiteful and is intent on tainting the reunion with a terrible dilemma.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_175.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_175.text: Yes. It was worth it. No words of yours can diminish that.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_175.context: CinematicNodeContext: SH smiles at the motes (while the line is directed at the player)NodeContext: Defiant - she's cut ties with Shar forever. Path 2: Shadowheart comes to this scene as someone who has turned from Shar and is seeking to rescue her parents - only Shar remains spiteful and is intent on tainting the reunion with a terrible dilemma.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_28.speaker: Player
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_28.text: This is your choice, Shadowheart. You don't need me to tell you what is right.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_151.speaker: Player
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_151.text: The Dark Lady offers you a rare kindness. Give the prisoners a merciful death. End your pain.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_0.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_0.text: And replace it with another. Don't ask me to kill my parents, please. I can't live with that.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_0.context: NodeContext: pleading. Path 2: Shadowheart comes to this scene as someone who has turned from Shar and is seeking to rescue her parents - only Shar remains spiteful and is intent on tainting the reunion with a terrible dilemma.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_169.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_169.text: The price of insubordination. You could have been blissfully ignorant if you stayed in my embrace. But you strayed. And now you choose.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_82.speaker: Player
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_82.text: Let your parents die with honour. They will become Selûne's martyrs, and you will be free.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_8.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_8.text: Free, but with the memory of what I've done. Don't ask me to kill my parents, please. I can't live with that.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_8.context: NodeContext: pleading. Path 2: Shadowheart comes to this scene as someone who has turned from Shar and is seeking to rescue her parents - only Shar remains spiteful and is intent on tainting the reunion with a terrible dilemma.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_35.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_35.text: Is this truly what you want?
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_35.context: NodeContext: Solemn, address to parents. Path 2: Shadowheart comes to this scene as someone who has turned from Shar and is seeking to rescue her parents - only Shar remains spiteful and is intent on tainting the reunion with a terrible dilemma.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_119.speaker: Player
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_119.text: She wants you to kill your parents. Her idea of a parting gift.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_92.speaker: Player
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_92.text: Talk to your mother and father. See what they wish.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_188.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_188.text: I'm... I'm sorry. I didn't know any of this was happening until it was much too late. I came to try put things right.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_188.context: NodeContext: Ashamed/contrite. Talking to her parents. Path 2: Shadowheart comes to this scene as someone who has turned from Shar and is seeking to rescue her parents - only Shar remains spiteful and is intent on tainting the reunion with a terrible dilemma.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_168.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_168.text: Leave? You should never have come. You should have hidden away forever.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_COM_168.context: NodeContext: Cold, imperious (Shadowheart is out of favour with Shar). Shar pose -starts with left hand underneath the floor as if holding up SH and co on a platter, right hand angling the tip of a sword towards SH and co, elbow back and head slightly tilted to her left. Then lowers the sword arm to her side (out of view for player) and stands looming over SH and co, left hand still appearing to hold them up.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_2.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_2.text: They already heard how you disgraced yourself before Lady Shar. How she marked you as the enemy. But it is quite another thing for them to see it for themselves.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia awaits SH. A sharran audience in the wings murmurs their disgust as SH appears

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: I am very glad you decided to return. A cautionary tale such as yours will be studied by Lady Shar's initiates for years to come.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_8.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_8.text: Now, do not be so foolish as to attack me. Unlike before, I am flesh and blood - but am very well protected.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_8.context: NodeContext: Cautioning - reference to how the player attacked an illusion of Viconia earlier while not aware it wasn't actually her.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_9.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_9.text: But perhaps I can make a case for some small measure of mercy. Give me the artefact, and I can at least make this quick.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: I don't answer to you. Not anymore. I'm here for my family.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: This is your family. And now you have turned your back on it.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Raised eyebrow in reaction to what SH just said. Small sweep of her right hand at the general surrounds.NodeContext: Raised eyebrow to betray a little surprise that Shadowheart is aware her parents are alive. Small sweep of her right hand at the general surrounds. Referring to the onlooking Shar worshippers

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Narrator
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: *You knew it would come to this. Yet still, your heart races: Viconia DeVir. Your mentor. Onetime mother figure. And now, your foe.*
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.context: CinematicNodeContext: SH tense expression/Viconia glowering expressionNodeContext: Vy-cone-eeh-ah De-Veer

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: L'il Alurl! For Shar!
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia gestures for her followers to attackNodeContext: Battle cry. l-ill allure

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: No. It will never be yours.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: You'll surrender it soon enough, once your last breath escapes you.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: Why do you even want the artefact so badly? Tell me the truth, at least this once.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_6.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_6.text: You're acting against Shar. She'll damn you as quickly as she damned me.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: The artefact. Now.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: You sent us against the Absolute? The githyanki? It was a suicide mission from the start.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: I've heard enough.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: Attack.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: I thought you might try to flee, rather than face us. Perhaps you are braver than I thought - or more arrogant than even I can fathom.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: No matter. You are here now, to face the Dark Lady's judgement, before a gathering of your peers. Give the artefact, and perhaps we will be merciful.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_2.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_2.text: And do not be so foolish as to attack me again. Unlike before, I am flesh and blood - but am very well protected.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_2.context: NodeContext: Cautioning - reference to how the player attacked an illusion of Viconia earlier while not aware it wasn't actually her.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_6.speaker: Jaheira
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_6.text: You've finally found yourself a following, Mother Superior. And you only had to hollow out their heads to do it.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Minsc
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: Pin your eyes to the treacherous she-drow. Do not focus on the many, many others - Boo will handle them.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_5.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_5.text: Always a pleasure to see old acquaintances. But you would be wise to not interfere in this matter.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_5.context: NodeContext: A little bittersweet, before hardening into a warning. Addressed to Minsc and/or Jaheira (old companions of hers from earlier games, shocked to see her again).

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: No. Lady Shar has chosen me to cleanse her ranks - you no longer have her blessing.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_8.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_8.text: Nonsense. Ravings. You've strayed, girl - you've failed Lady Shar's mission and allowed ambition to rot your mind.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_8.context: CinematicNodeContext: Watching sharrans react with disquiet, murmuring amongst themselves.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: The artefact is too powerful for you. The mission cannot be fulfilled. Lady Shar wishes for me to take your place.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: Do you hear these delusions? She defies my command. She thinks she knows better - she thinks she is better. But you will soon learn otherwise, girl.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Watching sharrans react with disquiet, murmuring amongst themselves.NodeContext: First section directed at onlooking Sharrans, last line directed at shadowheart

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: But please, continue - dig your own grave. It shall make for a fine lesson to all gathered before us.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: I survived the Gauntlet of Shar. I sacrificed Selûne's own daughter. I am your rightful leader.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: I walked through the depths of Lady Shar's darkness, where others feared to venture. I am favoured.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_4.speaker: Justiciar Crusader Nightmist
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_4.text: A true Sharran like you must be on the right side.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_4.context: CinematicNodeContext: The sharrans' murmurs grow more animated. One shouts out in support.NodeContext: Supportive, swayed by the player's argument

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_3.speaker: Justiciar Crusader Nightmist
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_3.context: CinematicNodeContext: A group of sharrans move to Shadowheart's back.NodeContext: Swearing fealty (having just changed sides to support the player)

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: So be it. A traitor's end awaits you all. These are the desperate lies of trapped vermin, nothing more. You are moon-sick, girl. A true lunatic.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia watches angrily as some followers change sides, then decries them and shadowheart to all assembled.NodeContext: First part (up to 'awaits you all') addressed to Sharrans who have abandoned her. Middle (up to 'nothing more' addressed to her remaining supporters. Last part directed at shadowheart.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_9.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_9.text: Urge the onlookers to heed Lady Shar - she speaks to you. She has chosen you.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: True

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_8.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_8.text: The traitors' ranks swell - much like a corpse left under the sun. I will take joy in making each and every one of you suffer.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_8.context: CinematicNodeContext: Another group of Sharrans break from the fold and side with Shadowheart. There is perhaps now an even split between the two. Viconia lambasts those who changed sides.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: Enough talk, girl. The sooner we finish this, the sooner your blood can be sluiced off Lady Shar's sacred Grotto.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_8.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_8.text: Show the holdouts the power that Lady Shar has blessed you with.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheat raises her right hand, which glows with the power of her Shar-given magic from the incurable wound in her palm - a black sphere of sharran magic, balanced above the wound. (Same as how it appeared on UUID 80fe690a-0c7e-9292-5888-9d49e6de3e58 of SHA_NightsongsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM). Shadowheart looks defiant, powerful. Awed murmurs can be heard from the assembled Sharrans.The last of Viconia's followers shuffle away from her. Viconia looks at them with disgust before turning her attention back to Shadowheart.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_2.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_2.text: No matter. I built this place from nothing - I can always start anew once you've been dealt with.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_3.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_3.text: You were right about one thing. Lady Shar's church does need to be cleansed - of you. And by my hand.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_4.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_4.text: Tell me one thing at least, before we end this - why did you want the artefact?

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_7.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_7.text: Lady Shar didn't ask you to do this. You betrayed her - pursued your own goals.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: You sent us against the Absolute? The githyanki? It was a suicide mission from the start.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: You've heard enough. Show the holdouts the power that Lady Shar has blessed you with.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: Attack.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: L'il Alurl! For Shar!
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia gestures for her followers to attackNodeContext: Battle cry. l-ill allure

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: The Absolute will be dealt with. As soon as I prise the artefact from your cold fingers.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.context: CinematicNodeContext: The onlooking Sharrans are unimpressed - none join Shadowheart's side. Viconia smiles and speaks to them.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: It seems your gambit is failing, girl. It would have been better if you had stayed away, stayed hidden.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: Tell the onlookers of the powers that Lady Shar has gifted you. Either they join you or face oblivion.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: Urge the onlookers to heed Lady Shar - she speaks to you. She has chosen you.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_5.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_5.text: Urge the onlookers to heed Lady Shar - she speaks to you. She has chosen you.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_2.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_2.text: Tell the onlookers of the powers that Lady Shar has gifted you. Either they join you or face oblivion.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_7.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_7.text: Tell the onlookers of the powers that Lady Shar has gifted you. Either they join you or face oblivion.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_7.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_7.text: Urge the onlookers to heed Lady Shar - she speaks to you. She has chosen you.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: Tell the onlookers of the powers that Lady Shar has gifted you. Either they join you or face oblivion.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_7.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_7.text: It seems none answer your call.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_7.context: CinematicNodeContext: The onlooking Sharrans are unimpressed - none join Shadowheart's side. Viconia smiles and speaks to them.NodeContext: Taunting

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_6.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_6.text: I walked through the depths of Lady Shar's darkness, where others feared to venture. I am favoured.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_6.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_6.text: I walked through the depths of Lady Shar's darkness, where others feared to venture. I am favoured.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_7.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_7.text: I survived the Gauntlet of Shar. I sacrificed Selûne's own daughter. I am your rightful leader.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_5.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_5.text: I survived the Gauntlet of Shar. I sacrificed Selûne's own daughter. I am your rightful leader.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_4.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_4.text: I survived the Gauntlet of Shar. I sacrificed Selûne's own daughter. I am your rightful leader.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: I walked through the depths of Lady Shar's darkness, where others feared to venture. I am favoured.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_3.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_3.text: Why do you even want the artefact so badly? Tell me the truth, at least this once.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_5.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_5.text: You always were too inquisitive for your own good - no matter how much I disciplined you. Very well - one little indulgence, before you face your reckoning.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_5.context: NodeContext: Cruel smirk. 'Fine, I'll humour you briefly.'

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_9.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_9.text: Whispers reached my ears from all corners - potential rivals of Lady Shar, all vying for the same prize. A new god, amassing the disaffected, the outcasts - those who should turn to us.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_9.context: NodeContext: Note of anger at the end - the Absolute is encrouching on her goddess's territory

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: This 'Absolute' is but an upstart; disturbing the natural order and threatening to impede the glorious return of Lady Shar's pure, endless darkness.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_4.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_4.text: I had to act. I had to strangle that foul conspiracy while it was still in the cradle.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_5.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_5.text: We learned all we could - the artefact was the one thing the Absolutists feared. The one thing they desperately wanted to keep out of their enemies' grasp. I had to have it.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: Lady Shar didn't ask you to do this. You betrayed her - pursued your own goals.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_9.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_9.text: Lady Shar is a goddess... she can afford to ignore that which does not threaten her.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_9.context: NodeContext: Hint of tension between her and her goddess. Their goals aren't aligned

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_2.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_2.text: I must keep her faith alive in mortal hearts. I must defend her ways, lead her children, stop all threats. Even if I must go against her wishes, I will prove myself her most loyal servant.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_3.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_3.text: You will not prevail here. But you may survive - if you give me the artefact.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_9.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_9.text: You sent us against the Absolute? The githyanki? It was a suicide mission from the start.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: You speak as though your life was not already forfeit. All that you are belongs to the Dark Lady, and in the end, she will take it all back. The only question is when.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: But the mission was our best chance - to fight so many foes openly could prove unwise. Shar's children are better deployed as daggers in the shadows, not massed upon a battlefield.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: So let the others fight, while we wait. Once they are spent and bloodied from each other, we would slip in and take the prize. Alas, all perished. All but you.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: Then answer me - where is the artefact?

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: No. Lady Shar has chosen me to cleanse her ranks - you no longer have her blessing.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_3.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_3.text: I survived the Gauntlet of Shar. I sacrificed Selûne's own daughter. I am your rightful leader.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_3.context: NodeContext: Addressing all the onlooking Shar followers in the hall

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_4.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_4.text: The threat of the Absolute is upon you all - and Viconia is not fit to lead you!

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: I don't answer to you. Not anymore. I'm here for my family.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_100.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_100.text: It can't be. Another vile trick -
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_100.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart approaches two upright discs upon which an elf man and human woman are restrained to each. (This should be reminiscent of the figure SH glimpsed in Shar's symbol during her vision after killing Nightsong). The elf man lifts his head to see Shadowheart and reacts with disbelief. His disc flares. He breaks off with a cry of pain.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_17.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_17.context: CinematicNodeContext: - both the prisoners suddenly writhe in pain against their restraints. Shadowheart glances down at her right hand in surprise.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: That was me. I did that. How...?

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_195.context: CinematicNodeContext: The chamber seems to grow darker suddenly. Shadowheart sees a vast silhouette of Shar leaning over her and her parents, in the same pose that the huge Shar statue at the centre of her temple in act 2 took (left hand underneath the floor as if holding up SH and co on a platter, right hand angling the tip of a sword towards SH and co, elbow back and head slightly tilted to her left) Shar's features cannot be clearly seen, but her words reverberate through SH's head.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_162.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_162.text: This was my gift to you. Power is not created; it merely changes from one form to another. Their pain becomes your might. Their suffering furthers your glory.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_162.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shar lowers the sword arm (right arm) out of view and gazes intently down at SH and co. Left arm still appears to be holding them up.NodeContext: Shar pose -starts with left hand underneath the floor as if holding up SH and co on a platter, right hand angling the tip of a sword towards SH and co, elbow back and head slightly tilted to her left. Then lowers the sword arm to her side (out of view for player) and stands looming over SH and co, left hand still appearing to hold them up.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_146.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_146.text: Their names are Arnell Hallowleaf, and his wife, Emmeline.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_146.context: NodeContext: All-poweful, yet motherly, soothing, supportive - SH has been her loyal follower up to this point, and Shar wishes her to make a final sacrifice. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_106.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_106.text: Once, they were among the most fanatical of my sister Selûne's followers, but for years they have been here, resisting my embrace.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_106.context: NodeContext: All-powerful, yet motherly, soothing, supportive - SH has been her loyal follower up to this point, and Shar wishes her to make a final sacrifice. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_192.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_192.text: Just as I wished them to.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_192.context: NodeContext: All-poweful, yet motherly, soothing, supportive - SH has been her loyal follower up to this point, and Shar wishes her to make a final sacrifice. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_159.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_159.text: Their wrongheaded resolve allowed me to shape you. But I need not tell you - I can show you. It is time to remember. Time to remember everything.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_0.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_0.text: Moonmaiden? Who the hells are you two?

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_207.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_207.text: They are part of my gift to you. Power is not created; it merely changes from one form to another. Their pain becomes your might. Their suffering furthers your glory.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_207.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shar lowers the sword arm (right arm) out of view and gazes intently down at SH and co. Left arm still appears to be holding them up.NodeContext: Shar pose -starts with left hand underneath the floor as if holding up SH and co on a platter, right hand angling the tip of a sword towards SH and co, elbow back and head slightly tilted to her left. Then lowers the sword arm to her side (out of view for player) and stands looming over SH and co, left hand still appearing to hold them up.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_135.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_135.text: As for their names, this is Arnell Hallowleaf, and his wife, Emmeline.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_135.context: NodeContext: All-poweful, yet motherly, soothing, supportive - SH has been her loyal follower up to this point, and Shar wishes her to make a final sacrifice. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_142.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_142.text: Their wrongheaded resolve allowed me to shape you. But I need not tell you - I can show you. It is time to remember. Time to remember everything.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_124.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_124.text: This can't be... Are they my parents? What have you done to them?

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_101.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_101.text: We, Shadowheart. We did this to them together. My power, and your will.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_101.context: NodeContext: All-poweful, yet motherly, soothing, supportive - SH has been her loyal follower up to this point, and Shar wishes her to make a final sacrifice. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_3.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_3.text: I don't believe it. Tell me it's not real, my Lady. Tell me it's a test.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_92.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_92.text: It is a test, but they are also who they appear to be - your parents. Your flesh and blood. Your sacrifice to make.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_92.context: NodeContext: All-poweful, yet motherly, soothing, supportive - SH has been her loyal follower up to this point, and Shar wishes her to make a final sacrifice. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_58.speaker: Emmeline Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_58.text: Jenevelle? Jen? Is that you? Why, you look so tall...

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_117.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_117.text: It's not her, Emm. It's just another trick. Another way to hurt us.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_125.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_125.text: Jenevelle is no more. She never left those dark woods - it was Shadowheart who emerged. This woman gave birth to you, but I made you. I am your Mother.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_125.context: NodeContext: Reasoning, urging. Soothing, but with a hard edge to it. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_204.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_204.text: A sacrifice is not a sacrifice if it has no meaning. This is the final step - snuff out the last embers of your old life, so that you can finally be who you were meant to be.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_204.context: NodeContext: Reasoning, urging. Soothing, but with a hard edge to it. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_45.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_45.text: Kill them, for me. Then I will take the memories away from you again. Loss will heal you, and you will be my right hand, at last.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_45.context: NodeContext: Reasoning, urging. Soothing, but with a hard edge to it. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_31.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_31.context: NodeContext: Firm. The soothing tones from before are quickly fading. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_114.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_114.text: Do you remember your training, child? I know you do. All the times you stood in this room, wondering why this pair seemed so familiar. All the times you honed your skills on them.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_114.context: NodeContext: Cold and imperious. Soothing tone has wilted away. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_25.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_25.text: They remember everything. The pain. The pleading. Their torturer, wearing their daughter's face. End their nightmare. Give them peace.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_25.context: NodeContext: Cold and imperious. Soothing tone has wilted away. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_137.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_137.text: Do as you are commanded to. End their suffering.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_138.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_138.text: No. I'm leaving this place. I'm leaving you. And I'm taking my parents with me.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_191.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_191.text: So much was done to mould you, and still you turn your back on me, for two strangers that you share blood with?
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_191.context: NodeContext: Cold and imperious. Soothing tone has wilted away. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_83.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_83.text: Go then, leave - the dark will still be waiting. But keep some memories as a parting gift.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_83.context: NodeContext: Anger rising as she's being opening defied. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_214.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_214.text: You learned so much, applying your skills to these two. Now you can remember it all, whenever you look upon their faces.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_214.context: NodeContext: Bitter, angry. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_69.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_69.text: You showed great promise, but no more. When the darkness finally comes for you again, it will not be my welcoming embrace - it will be a hungry maw, then nothing. Farewell.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_69.context: NodeContext: Bitter, angry. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_153.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shar's visage fades away. The dark aura in the chamber of loss recedes. Shadowheart's parents are both freed from their soul cage bonds.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_200.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_200.text: You did it, Jen. You found your way home.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_80.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_80.text: I... I hurt you both. So much. Gods forgive me...

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_39.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_39.text: There is nothing to forgive. You did what was necessary. To survive.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_140.speaker: Emmeline Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_140.text: And I have my daughter back. What more could a mother want?

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_190.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart embraces her parents gently.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_163.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_163.text: I'm getting you out of here. There's a place where you'll be safe.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_65.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_65.text: Just let us know where to go - we'll find our way.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_172.speaker: Emmeline Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_172.text: The Moonmaiden will guide us. Just as she guided you.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_206.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_206.text: I thought you were my goddess... but you're just a monster.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_196.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_196.text: I am neither. I am nothing. I am the empty room. The dreamless sleep. The shadow's shadow. There was no pain before my sister set the sun aflame. Now you exist to suffer, until you find your way back to my embrace.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_196.context: NodeContext: Cold and imperious. Soothing tone has wilted away. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_177.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_177.text: I shall carry out your will, my Lady.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_55.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_55.text: Whatever happens, we love you all the same.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_44.speaker: Emmeline Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_44.text: We never stopped. Thank you, Moonmaiden. You let me see my Jenevelle, my baby girl, one last time.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_208.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_208.text: Don't call me that. My name is Shadowheart.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_149.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_149.text: You are just lost, Jenevelle. Selûne will show you the way home, in time -

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_5.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_5.text: Unleash Lady Shar's power. Sacrifice them.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_171.context: CinematicNodeContext: SH's power flares wildly, engulfing the pair. Their Sharran disc restraints vanish and they collapse to the floor, dead. Shadowheart drops to her knees, in shock.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_89.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_89.text: It is done. And done well. They are with me now, in my endless dark. And from them, you can draw endless power.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_89.context: NodeContext: Proud, soothing. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_122.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_122.text: I still remember. Everything I did to them.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_36.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_36.text: No longer. Forget. Forget and rise.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_36.context: NodeContext: Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_133.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart blinks in confusion, glancing around. She rises back to her feet.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_183.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_183.text: What happened? I remember entering this chamber, then... nothing.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_78.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_78.text: Is it over? Have I proven myself, Lady Shar?

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_178.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_178.context: NodeContext: Proud, triumphant. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_152.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_152.text: You did all that I asked of you. You made one last sacrifice in my name, now this place is yours to command, and my power is yours to wield, my Chosen.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_152.context: NodeContext: Proud, triumphant. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_16.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_16.text: They are nothing. Empty husks. Remnants of your sacrifice in my name.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_16.context: NodeContext: Proud, triumphant. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_13.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_13.text: Now this place is yours to command, and my power is yours to wield, my Chosen.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_13.context: NodeContext: Proud, triumphant. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view.
