Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_132.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_132.text: Soon a great battle will commence in this city - and you shall lead my forces to victory. Now go forth.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_132.context: NodeContext: Proud, triumphant. Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_81.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shar's visage fades away. The dark aura in the chamber of loss recedes.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_147.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_147.text: What am I to do now?

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_126.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_126.text: First you must forget. The sacrifice has been made. Surrender all memories of these two to my embrace.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_126.context: NodeContext: Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_202.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_202.text: If this is a test, what must I do?

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_113.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_113.text: That was me... I hurt them. How?
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_113.context: NodeContext: Path 1: Shadowheart comes to this scene as a loyal Sharran who is intent on taking control of the church at her goddess’s command. She's found herself being commanded to sacrifice her long-lost parents.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_34.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_34.text: Their wrongheaded resolve allowed me to shape you - their daughter. Time to remember.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_97.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_97.text: They're... they're my parents? What have you done to them?
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_97.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart winces as a flood of memories are restored to her.NodeContext: Path 1: Shadowheart comes to this scene as a loyal Sharran who is intent on taking control of the church at her goddess’s command. She's found herself being commanded to sacrifice her long-lost parents.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_74.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_74.context: NodeContext: Path 1: Shadowheart comes to this scene as a loyal Sharran who is intent on taking control of the church at her goddess’s command. She's found herself being commanded to sacrifice her long-lost parents.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_139.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_139.text: I still remember. Who they were. What I did to them...
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_139.context: NodeContext: dazed, shocked. Path 1: Shadowheart comes to this scene as a loyal Sharran who is intent on taking control of the church at her goddess’s command. She's found herself being commanded to sacrifice her long-lost parents.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_15.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_15.text: I'm here to get you out of this place.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_15.context: NodeContext: Path 2: Shadowheart comes to this scene as someone who has turned from Shar and is seeking to rescue her parents - only Shar remains spiteful and is intent on tainting the reunion with a terrible dilemma.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_136.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_136.text: You're a monster, not a goddess.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_136.context: NodeContext: Angry, defiant. Path 2: Shadowheart comes to this scene as someone who has turned from Shar and is seeking to rescue her parents - only Shar remains spiteful and is intent on tainting the reunion with a terrible dilemma.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_189.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_189.text: The hells with this. I'm here to save you.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_189.context: NodeContext: Defiant. Path 2: Shadowheart comes to this scene as someone who has turned from Shar and is seeking to rescue her parents - only Shar remains spiteful and is intent on tainting the reunion with a terrible dilemma.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_2.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_2.text: No, I'm not giving up on you. We can weather whatever Shar has in store for us, together.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_2.context: NodeContext: Path 2: Shadowheart comes to this scene as someone who has turned from Shar and is seeking to rescue her parents - only Shar remains spiteful and is intent on tainting the reunion with a terrible dilemma.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_186.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_186.text: First I need to get you out of these restraints. Then find your way to our camp - you'll be safe there.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_186.context: NodeContext: Path 2: Shadowheart comes to this scene as someone who has turned from Shar and is seeking to rescue her parents - only Shar remains spiteful and is intent on tainting the reunion with a terrible dilemma.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_212.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_212.text: It can't be. Another vile trick...
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_212.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart approaches two upright discs upon which an elf man and human woman are restrained to each. (This should be reminiscent of the figure SH glimpsed in Shar's symbol during her vision after killing Nightsong). The elf man lifts his head to see Shadowheart and reacts with disbelief. His disc flares. He breaks off with a cry of pain.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_205.speaker: Emmeline Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_205.text: No... there is no trick. It's her. Jenevelle. Jen. Our little girl.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_47.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_47.text: I'm here to get you out of this place.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_42.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_42.text: We made it, Emm. She came back for us. It's over.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_66.context: CinematicNodeContext: The chamber seems to grow darker suddenly. Shadowheart sees a vast silhouette of Shar leaning over her and her parents, in the same pose that the huge Shar statue at the centre of her temple in act 2 took (left hand underneath the floor as if holding up SH and co on a platter, right hand angling the tip of a sword towards SH and co, elbow back and head slightly tilted to her left) Shar's features cannot be clearly seen, but her words reverberate through SH's head.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_38.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_38.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart doubles over in pain as her incurable wound flares intensely. Her parents also writhe in agony. Finally it abates and Shadowheart stands. Shar lowers the sword arm (right arm) out of view and gazes intently down at SH and co. Left arm still appears to be holding them up.NodeContext: Cold, imperious (Shadowheart is out of favour with Shar). Shar pose -starts with left hand underneath the floor as if holding up SH and co on a platter, right hand angling the tip of a sword towards SH and co, elbow back and head slightly tilted to her left. Then lowers the sword arm to her side (out of view for player) and stands looming over SH and co, left hand still appearing to hold them up.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_96.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_96.text: You see? It matters not if you raze this place, if you slay every one of your brothers and sisters. That was never where my power resided.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_96.context: NodeContext: Cold, imperious (Shadowheart is out of favour with Shar). Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_144.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_144.text: Every time you try to step away from me, every time you try to reach for Selûne, my hold on you bites deeper. If you had learned, if you had obeyed, there would be no pain. But you struggle on. You make things worse for yourself. And for them.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_144.context: NodeContext: Cold, imperious (Shadowheart is out of favour with Shar). Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_76.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_76.text: You're a monster, not a goddess.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_127.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_127.text: I am neither. I am nothing. I am the empty room. The dreamless sleep. The shadow's shadow. There was no pain before my sister set the sun aflame. Now you exist to suffer, until you find your way back to my embrace.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_127.context: NodeContext: Cold, imperious (Shadowheart is out of favour with Shar). Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_161.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_161.text: I don't care - I've found my parents. I've won.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_51.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_51.text: Won? Your victory is but a guttering candle in the dark. Temporary. Inconsequential.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_51.context: NodeContext: Cold, imperious (Shadowheart is out of favour with Shar). Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_10.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_10.text: Ask your sire - he knows. You are all bound to each other. And to me.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_10.context: NodeContext: Cold, imperious (Shadowheart is out of favour with Shar). Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_72.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_72.text: It's true. We are still bound to you. You cannot both free us and free yourself from her curse.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_131.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_131.text: The Moonmaiden needs you more than she needs us. You are the future - you must return to the fold. We are the past. And our duty is almost done.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_112.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_112.text: Eloquently put. His mind stood up well to his time here. The same cannot be said for your mother - such brief, fragile lives humans lead.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_112.context: NodeContext: Cold, imperious (Shadowheart is out of favour with Shar). Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_168.speaker: Shar
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_168.text: This is my final lesson. I leave you now, to dwell on your mistakes and make your choice. End their suffering and free yourself. Or prolong the pain, together.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_168.context: NodeContext: Cold, imperious (Shadowheart is out of favour with Shar). Shar pose: right arm at her side (previously seen holding a sword - still in hand but no longer in view. Left hand extended underneath the platform on which SH an co stand, as if holding them in her palm/on a platter before her. Speaking down to them.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_166.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shar's silhouette melts away and the dark Shadowfell aura fades. The room is as it was before.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_64.speaker: Narrator
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_64.text: *Shar's parting words make your flesh crawl. You fear that you know all-too-well what choice she spoke of, though you wish it wasn't so.*

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_18.speaker: Narrator
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_18.text: *Your chance at freedom from Shar's curse, and your parents' very lives - they are entwined. One cannot be claimed without the loss of another.*

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_141.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_141.text: Did she mean what I think she did...?

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_165.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_165.text: Shar is a spiteful creature. She will never admit defeat - not until she has stolen one last thing from you. Your future must not be her final prize. Not after all we have endured to see you again.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_11.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_11.text: You'll never be entirely free of her torments as long as we draw breath. You must end this - give us Selûne's mercy.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_61.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_61.text: The hells with this. I'm here to save you.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_60.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_60.text: And you did. You found us.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_145.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_145.text: All these years, that dream kept us going, that you would break free. No matter what they made you do to us, we knew you were still in there.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_150.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_150.text: I'm not harming you. I can't.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_50.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_50.text: Not harming us - freeing us. The dream that you'd find your way back to us was the only thing that kept us going, all these years.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_26.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_26.text: Now you're here, and we can rest.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_119.speaker: Emmeline Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_119.text: I knew the dark woods wouldn't frighten you. You were always such a brave girl.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_185.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_185.text: She was. And still is. You've saved us. Now save yourself. You'll be out of Shar's reach, and we'll be at peace.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_19.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_19.text: But I only just found you again.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_209.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_209.text: We'll still be with you. By the Moonmaiden's grace, we'll never be far. Please, Jenevelle.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_118.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_118.text: Are you sure this is what you want?

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_98.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_98.text: It is what we need, all of us. You were meant to be a guiding light for Selûne's faithful, but they robbed you from us. Now that can be righted, and we can rest.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_175.speaker: Emmeline Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_175.text: Help us, Jen. I can let go, now I've seen your face again.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_43.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart's hand begins to glow with Selûnite power. It intensifies, engulfing her and her parents. The player turns away...

... the glow fades. Shadowheart's parents are gone. In their place are two floating motes of light. They dance gently in the air before Shadowheart. She smiles at them.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_104.speaker: Narrator
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_104.text: *Moon motes. They bring Selûne's light to dark places and offer guidance to those in need. Your parents still watch over you.*

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_130.speaker: Narrator
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_130.text: *And they wish for you to leave this place behind.*
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_130.context: CinematicNodeContext: The moon motes flit away out of frame, as if heading for the exit.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_198.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_198.text: Call on Selûne's power to end their suffering.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_211.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_211.text: No, I'm not giving up on you. We can weather whatever Shar has in store for us, together.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_84.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_84.text: No, Jenevelle, you mustn't. We'll be a burden to you -

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_194.speaker: Emmeline Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_194.text: Hush, Arnell. The Moonmaiden guides her, don't you see?
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_194.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressing her husband, but looking at SH with a studying, reverential expression

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_197.speaker: Emmeline Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_197.text: Jen wants her family. Jen shall have her family. How can we help, dear?

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_180.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_180.text: Use Selûne's power to break their bindings.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_86.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_86.text: First I need to get you out of these restraints. Then find your way to our camp - you'll be safe there.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_68.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart's hand begins to glow with Selûnite power. It intensifies, engulfing her and her parents. The player turns away... the glow fades. SH's parents are now free of their restraints, weak on their feet. Shadowheart embraces them gently.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_170.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_170.text: We will find the way from here. Do what you need to, Jenevelle.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_40.speaker: Emmeline Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_40.text: We will see you soon, with the Moonmaiden's guidance.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_33.speaker: Shadowheart
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_33.text: Ignore Shar. Turn to free your parents.

ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_129.speaker: Arnell Hallowleaf
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_129.text: You cannot. We are still bound to you. You cannot both free us and free yourself from her curse.
ParentsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_129.context: NodeContext: Cold, imperious (Shadowheart is out of favour with Shar)

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_2.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_2.text: They already heard how you disgraced yourself before Lady Shar. How she marked you as the enemy. But it is quite another thing for them to see it for themselves.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia awaits SH. A sharran audience in the wings murmurs their disgust as SH appears

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_5.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_5.text: I am very glad you decided to return. A cautionary tale such as yours will be studied by Lady Shar's initiates for years to come.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_121.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_121.text: But perhaps I can make a case for some small measure of mercy. Give me the artefact, and I can at least make this quick.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_121.context: InternalNodeContext: Node is optional if LOW_SharGrotto_ConfrontViconia_NoShadowheart previously covered the topic of the artefact sufficiently,

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_52.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_52.text: Enough. I don't answer to you. Not anymore. I'm here for my family.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_52.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia's brow raises as SH mentions her family.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_130.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_130.text: That's right. I know what you did. And it's not going to be quick - not for you.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_130.context: NodeContext: She just told Viconia she knows her parents are alive.  'That's right' is following from Viconia's expression reacting to this.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_148.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_148.text: This is your family. And now you have turned your back on it.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_148.context: CinematicNodeContext: Small sweep of her right hand at the general surrounds.NodeContext: Small sweep of her right hand at the general surrounds. Referring to the onlooking Shar worshippers

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_65.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_65.text: The artefact was your last chance to prove yourself - and you squandered it.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_42.speaker: Player
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_42.text: Shadowheart has nothing to prove to the likes of you.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_0.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_0.text: Curious, have you had a chance of heart? Or forgotten our little agreement? Turn this wayward child over to me, and you shall go free, with Lady Shar's faithful as your allies.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to GROUP_Players rather than SHNodeContext: Addressed to GROUP_Players rather than SH. Referring to an earlier agreement they made to betray SH.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_108.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_108.text: Such misplaced camaraderie. How about this - surrender this one to me, now, and you can leave freely, and consider Lady Shar's forces your allies in the battles to come.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_108.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to GROUP_Players rather than SHNodeContext: Addressed to GROUP_Players rather than SH. Offering them a way out if they betray SH.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_145.speaker: Player
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_145.text: This was a mistake. We shouldn't have come here.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_76.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_76.text: Fear not - remember the terms of our little agreement? Turn this wayward child over to me, and you shall go free, with Lady Shar's faithful as your allies.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_76.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to GROUP_Players rather than SHNodeContext: Addressed to GROUP_Players rather than SH. Referring to an earlier agreement they made to betray SH.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_151.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_151.text: You can still leave, if you are wise - surrender this one to me, now, and you can consider Lady Shar's forces your allies in the battles to come.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_151.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to GROUP_Players rather than SHNodeContext: Addressed to GROUP_Players rather than SH. Offering them a way out if they betray SH.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_137.speaker: Player
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_137.text: Why is the artefact so important to you?

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_93.speaker: Player
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_93.text: Shar bid you to do all of this?

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_81.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_81.text: Shar doesn't care. She was always going to use you and discard you - but now I'm going to deal with you first.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_81.context: NodeContext: Defiant, addressed to Viconia (Enemy of Shar path - SH is here to save her parents)

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_119.speaker: Player
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_119.text: You thought you could best the Absolute? The githyanki?

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_70.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_70.text: I should thank you. If you hadn't sent me on that suicide mission, I'd never have learned the truth.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_70.context: NodeContext: Defiant, addressed to Viconia (Enemy of Shar path - SH is here to save her parents)

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_61.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_61.context: NodeContext: Defiant, glaring at Viconia while responding to Player  (Enemy of Shar path - SH is here to save her parents)

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_9.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_9.text: You there - remember our agreement? Surrender her to me, now, and you can consider Lady Shar's forces your allies in the battles to come.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_35.speaker: Player
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_35.context: NodeContext: Outraged. The player is betraying Shadowheart Viconia in spite of promising not to do such a thing before.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_27.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_27.text: No! Were you meaning to backstab me all along, or did you lose your spine along the way?

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_12.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_12.text: You keep such shrewd companions, Shadowheart. A shame you didn't learn from them. Seize her.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_12.context: CinematicNodeContext: Two sharrans approach Shadowheart. The player watches as she's hauled away.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_141.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_141.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia gestures for her followers to attackNodeContext: l-ill allure

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_75.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_75.text: You there - surrender this one to me, now, and you can consider Lady Shar's forces your allies in the battles to come.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_16.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_16.text: I thought you might try to flee, rather than face us. Perhaps you are braver than I thought - or more arrogant than even I can fathom.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_16.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia awaits SH. Shar followers watch from the sides.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_103.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_103.text: Now, do not be so foolish as to attack me. Unlike before, I am flesh and blood - but am very well protected.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_103.context: NodeContext: Cautioning - reference to how the player attacked an illusion of Viconia earlier while not aware it wasn't actually her.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_150.speaker: Jaheira
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_150.text: You've finally found yourself a following, Mother Superior. And you only had to hollow out their heads to do it.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_150.context: NodeContext: Mocking - Viconia is declaiming in front of an audience

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_115.speaker: Minsc
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_115.text: Pin your eyes to the treacherous she-drow. Do not focus on the many, many others - Boo will handle them.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_115.context: NodeContext: Low tones, strategising / advising player - the party will handle Viconia, Boo will take the dozens of other Sharrans in the gallery.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_15.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_15.text: Always a pleasure to see old acquaintances. But you would be wise to not interfere in this matter.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_15.context: NodeContext: A little bittersweet, before hardening into a warning. Addressed to Minsc and/or Jaheira (old companions of hers from earlier games, shocked to see her again).

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_94.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_94.text: No matter. You are here now, to face the Dark Lady's judgement, before a gathering of your peers. Give the artefact, and perhaps we will be merciful.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_155.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_155.text: No. I already faced Lady Shar. I passed her trials, I wielded her spear, and now I am her mortal voice. I have been embraced by her in ways you could only dream of.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_47.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_47.text: Nonsense. Ravings. You've strayed, girl - you've failed Lady Shar's mission and allowed ambition to rot your mind.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_47.context: CinematicNodeContext: Murmurs reverberate from the onlooking Sharrans. Viconia scowls.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_126.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_126.text: Tell her. Tell them all. Tell them how the Nightsinger has blessed me.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_147.speaker: Player
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_147.text: Wait. Before we go any further, tell me what this is about. Why do you even want the artefact?

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_57.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_57.text: I did not consent to questions. But I suppose you have undergone a great deal to reach this place, and anything I tell you cannot compromise me now - for you will either leave on my terms, or not at all...
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_57.context: NodeContext: Icy threat in the first sentence, then relenting a little - 'might as well toss 'em a bone'.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_84.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_84.text: Whispers reached my ears from all corners - potential rivals of Lady Shar, all vying for the same prize. A new god, amassing the disaffected, the outcasts - those who should turn to us.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_84.context: NodeContext: Note of anger at the end - the Absolute is encrouching on her goddess's territory

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_132.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_132.text: This 'Absolute' is but an upstart; disturbing the natural order and threatening to impede the glorious return of Lady Shar's pure, endless darkness.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_101.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_101.text: I had to act. I had to strangle that foul conspiracy while it was still in the cradle.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_112.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_112.text: We learned all we could - the artefact was the one thing the Absolutists feared. The one thing they desperately wanted to keep out of their enemies' grasp. I had to have it.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_113.speaker: Player
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_113.text: Shar bid you to do all of this?

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_24.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_24.text: Lady Shar's concerns lie elsewhere - with another. But she is a goddess... she can afford to ignore that which does not threaten her.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_24.context: NodeContext: Hint of tension between her and her goddess. Their goals aren't aligned

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_74.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_74.text: I must keep her faith alive in mortal hearts. I must defend her ways, lead her children, stop all threats. Even if I must go against her wishes, I will prove myself her most loyal servant.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_86.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_86.text: You think you know better than the Dark Lady? No wonder she sent me to this place of your poison.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_86.context: NodeContext: Defiant. Addressed to Viconia. (shar path - committed to her goddess and on a mission to overthrow her superior)

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_116.speaker: Player
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_116.text: You thought you could best the Absolute? The githyanki?

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_139.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_139.text: To fight so many foes openly could prove unwise. Shar's children are better deployed as daggers in the shadows, not massed upon a battlefield.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_17.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_17.text: So let the others fight, while we wait. Once they are spent and bloodied from each other, we would slip in and take the prize. Alas, most of those I sent, perished. All but one.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_152.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_152.text: Lady Shar protected me. She guided me, elevated me. And now she wants me to cast you down.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_152.context: NodeContext: Defiant. Addressed to Viconia. (shar path - committed to her goddess and on a mission to overthrow her superior)

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_99.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_99.text: Tell them what you witnessed. Tell them how Lady Shar favours me.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_99.context: NodeContext: Addressed to the player, seeking support. (shar path - committed to her goddess and on a mission to overthrow her superior)

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_49.speaker: Player
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_49.text: It's true. She survived the Gauntlet of Shar. She sacrificed Selûne's own daughter. She is your rightful leader.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_127.speaker: Player
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_127.text: It's true. She survived the Gauntlet of Shar. She sacrificed Selûne's own daughter. She is your rightful leader.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_31.speaker: Player
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_31.text: It's true. She survived the Gauntlet of Shar. She sacrificed Selûne's own daughter. She is your rightful leader.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_4.speaker: Player
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_4.text: It's true. She survived the Gauntlet of Shar. She sacrificed Selûne's own daughter. She is your rightful leader.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_45.speaker: Player
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_45.text: It's true. She survived the Gauntlet of Shar. She sacrificed Selûne's own daughter. She is your rightful leader.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_136.speaker: Player
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_136.text: It's true. She survived the Gauntlet of Shar. She sacrificed Selûne's own daughter. She is your rightful leader.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_32.speaker: Player
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_32.text: It's true. She survived the Gauntlet of Shar. She sacrificed Selûne's own daughter. She is your rightful leader.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_20.speaker: Player
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_20.text: It's true. She survived the Gauntlet of Shar. She sacrificed Selûne's own daughter. She is your rightful leader.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_102.speaker: Player
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_102.text: I saw her walk through a shadow curse, where others feared to venture. Shar favours her.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_72.speaker: Player
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_72.text: I saw her walk through a shadow curse, where others feared to venture. Shar favours her.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_26.speaker: Player
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_26.text: I saw her walk through a shadow curse, where others feared to venture. Shar favours her.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_138.speaker: Player
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_138.text: I saw her walk through a shadow curse, where others feared to venture. Shar favours her.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_77.speaker: Player
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_77.text: I saw her walk through a shadow curse, where others feared to venture. Shar favours her.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_88.speaker: Player
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_88.text: I saw her walk through a shadow curse, where others feared to venture. Shar favours her.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_142.speaker: Player
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_142.text: I saw her walk through a shadow curse, where others feared to venture. Shar favours her.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_36.speaker: Player
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_36.text: I saw her walk through a shadow curse, where others feared to venture. Shar favours her.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_30.speaker: Justiciar Crusader Nightmist
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_30.text: A true Sharran like you must be on the right side.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_30.context: CinematicNodeContext: The sharrans' murmurs grow more animated. One shouts out in support.NodeContext: Supportive, swayed by the player's argument

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_18.speaker: Justiciar Crusader Nightmist
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_18.context: CinematicNodeContext: A group of sharrans move to Shadowheart's back.NodeContext: Swearing fealty (having just changed sides to support the player)

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_135.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_135.text: So be it. A traitor's end awaits you all. These are the desperate lies of trapped vermin, nothing more. You are deluded, girl.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_135.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia watches angrily before shouting to the Sharrrans.NodeContext: First part (up to 'awaits you all') addressed to Sharrans who have abandoned her. Middle (up to 'nothing more' addressed to her remaining supporters. Last part directed at shadowheart.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_69.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_69.text: You see? She is nothing but a deluded girl trying to bluff her way out of our rightful judgement - nothing more.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_69.context: CinematicNodeContext: The onlooking Sharrans are unimpressed - none join Shadowheart's side. Viconia smiles and speaks to them.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_64.speaker: Player
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_64.text: She slew a helpless prisoner, deep in an ancient ruin. Perhaps that warrants Shar's blessing.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_56.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_56.text: That's all? Why any back-alley cut-throat could earn the Dark Lady's blessing in those circumstances. You are deluded, girl.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_56.context: CinematicNodeContext: The onlooking Sharrans are unimpressed - none join Shadowheart's side. Viconia smiles and speaks to them.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_67.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_67.text: I'm not here to convince you, Mother. You are already disgraced in Lady Shar's eyes. I merely wish to give the others a chance to repent, before they are dragged down with you.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_122.speaker: Narrator
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_122.text: *A coup attempt. Shadowheart will need all the help she can get if she's to win over the remaining diehards from Viconia's ranks.*

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_23.speaker: Player
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_23.text: Connect with her mind. Suggest she talk about the power Shar granted her.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_120.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_120.text: I sank a spear into the heart of the Moonwitch's daughter. Lady Shar rewarded me - she turned the pain that once held me back into the power that now drives me on.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_120.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart gives you a small nod before speaking to the Sharrans.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_48.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_48.text: And she told me to cleanse her church of those who failed her.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_48.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart points at Viconia on 'those who failed her'.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_53.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_53.text: The traitors' ranks swell - like a corpse left under the sun. I will take joy in making each and every one of you suffer.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_53.context: CinematicNodeContext: Another group of Sharrans break from the fold and side with Shadowheart. There is perhaps now an even split between the two. Viconia lambasts those who changed sides.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_131.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_131.text: Enough talk, girl. The sooner we finish this, the sooner your blood can be sluiced off Lady Shar's sacred Grotto.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_21.speaker: Player
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_21.text: Give Shadowheart a chance to sway more of Viconia's followers.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_140.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_140.text: Enough speeches - the odds are already in my favour. Do you think the Dark Lady would want you to die for a lost cause? Or show some cunning and live another day?

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_29.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_29.text: No matter. I built this place from nothing - I can always start anew once you've been dealt with.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_29.context: CinematicNodeContext: The final contingent of Viconia's followers abandon her.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_114.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_114.text: You were right about one thing - Lady Shar's church does need to be cleansed. By my hand.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_59.speaker: Player
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_59.text: Wait - I have to know, before it's too late. Why did you want the Astral Prism?

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_91.speaker: Player
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_91.text: Shar bid you to do all of this?

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_38.speaker: Player
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_38.text: You thought you could best the Absolute? The githyanki?

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_11.speaker: Player
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_11.text: I've heard enough. Deal with this lot how you wish, Shadowheart.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_44.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_44.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia gestures for her followers to attackNodeContext: l-ill allure

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_50.speaker: Player
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_50.text: Use the parasite. Urge Shadowheart to speak of the Absolute threat. Only she can lead them to victory.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_34.speaker: Shadowheart
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_34.text: Viconia would have you hide down here, oblivious to the true danger - the Absolute must be stopped, and only I can lead you. Lady Shar has decreed it!
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_34.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart addresses the Sharran audience

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_78.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_78.text: The Absolute will be dealt with. As soon as I prise the artefact from your cold fingers.
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_78.context: CinematicNodeContext: The onlooking Sharrans are unimpressed - none join Shadowheart's side. Viconia smiles and speaks to them.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_87.speaker: Player
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_87.text: I don't know what she's talking about.

ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_111.speaker: Player
ConfrontViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_111.text: I said I'd bring you Shadowheart - she's all yours.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Shadowheart
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: I won't remember you at all. Nobody will.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_2.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_2.text: So you think you have won? Time will tell - far easier to claim something than hold onto it.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_3.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_3.text: They will turn on you, in time. When you hear the whispers, and see the blades drawn, remember my face.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Shadowheart
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: I won't remember you at all. Nobody will.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_3.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_3.text: You know nothing of what lies ahead. Go on - enter the Chamber of Loss. See for yourself.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Shadowheart
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: Don't worry, Mother. I'll learn from your mistakes.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: Mother. You do not know what awaits you. Go - enter the Chamber of Loss and claim your prize. It may not be what you think.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_2.speaker: Shadowheart
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_2.text: Leave. If you're wise, you'll vanish as if you're dead and buried.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_7.speaker: Shadowheart
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_7.text: I'm not done with you yet. My parents. Where are they?

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_7.speaker: Shadowheart
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_7.text: Why me? What was all this for?

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_6.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_6.text: Finish it. Send me to Lady Shar's embrace.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_5.speaker: Shadowheart
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_5.text: I'm not done with you yet. My parents. Where are they?

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_7.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_7.text: So blunt - have you forgotten all the interrogation techniques I taught you? Where is the finesse?

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_3.speaker: Shadowheart
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_3.text: I could demonstrate some techniques, if you insist.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_6.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_6.text: Oh I have seen you at work. More than you realise.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_3.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_3.text: Your parents are right through that door, in the Chamber of Loss. Where they have been all along. You saw them many times, only we made you forget.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_2.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_2.text: They watched, as we moulded you. They watched. They wept. They bled - often at your hand. It may not be a happy reunion, but it will be a memorable one.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_5.speaker: Shadowheart
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_5.text: You're lying. I wouldn't do that.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_5.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_5.text: You can see for yourself easily enough. This was all for you, even though you have never appreciated it.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_2.speaker: Shadowheart
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_2.text: Why me? What was all this for?

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: Lady Shar commanded me. And I obeyed. I do not question - I merely act as she wills me to.
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.context: NodeContext: A little thrown by Shadowheart's question. Why ask what is obvious?

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_7.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_7.text: I had an enclave in Waterdeep, you know. Much grander than this. Shar ordered me to raze it, kill all who followed me - claim they betrayed me, when in fact I slew those who showed nothing but loyalty.
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_7.context: NodeContext: Bitterness creeping in. 'I had it all, and was forced to sacrifice it'

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_8.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_8.text: Shar had me do that, and I did. To cover my tracks. To usher you in.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_7.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_7.text: Sympathy is for the weak. I merely want to say my piece. I want you to know the cost of your education.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_2.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_2.text: You became my mission. To take a child of Selûne's most dedicated followers, and turn her over to Lady Shar. To show that all light fades, and darkness will prevail in the end.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_3.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_3.text: All this was to make you into what the Dark Lady needed you to be - the planning. The training. Those deaths in Waterdeep. It was all to groom you to replace me at her right hand side.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_5.speaker: Jaheira
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_5.text: Are you sore, Mother Superior? You brought her to the same crossroads you yourself once stood at - but you cannot force her to follow.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_5.speaker: Minsc
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_5.text: There was a time when you would flirt with goodness and justice, Viconia - let Minsc and Boo be the last to reject your advances.
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_5.context: NodeContext: Grim, looking down on Viconia - she once leaned towards redeeming herself, but has fallen too far

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_2.speaker: Shadowheart
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_2.text: Leave. Leave and vanish, or you'll wish I killed you here.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_4.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_4.text: I already wish you had - then perhaps you would have demonstrated some of the spine I sought to instil in you. Aluve.
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_4.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia gets to her feet and leaves. (Include standing up, but dont worry about her leaving.)NodeContext: Veiled insult ('you're too soft') ah-LOO-veh ('I leave you')

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_6.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_6.context: CinematicNodeContext: SH strikes. Viconia speaks to her goddess with her last breath, and falls back, dead.NodeContext: Spoken to her deity in her moment of death

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_6.speaker: Shadowheart
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_6.text: I've heard enough - leave. Vanish, or you'll wish I killed you here.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_5.speaker: Shadowheart
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_5.text: Get out of here. If you're wise, you'll vanish for good.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_3.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_3.text: Mercy? You were never one of us. Not truly. Aluve.
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_3.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia gets to her feet and leaves. (Include standing up, but dont worry about her leaving.)NodeContext: Veiled insult ('you're too soft') ah-LOO-veh ('I leave you')

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_2.speaker: Shadowheart
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_2.text: Finish it? No - I want you to live, having lost everything. Leave.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_2.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_2.text: Perhaps you have a greater capacity for cruelty than I credited you with. Aluve.
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia gets to her feet and leaves. (Include standing up, but dont worry about her leaving.)NodeContext:  ah-LOO-veh ('I leave you')

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_11.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_11.text: Shadowheart... I wasn't sure if I'd ever lay eyes on you again. It's me, Nocturne. Do you remember?

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_34.speaker: Narrator
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_34.text: *You recall the memory Shadowheart recovered by eating the noblestalk - this must be the person she remembered.*

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_2.speaker: Shadowheart
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_2.text: I remember you, but you're different... very different. I used to call you something else, didn't I?

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_64.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_64.text: You did - but that's not who I am now. I remember the other initiates used to tease you about your name - the one you chose to honour Lady Shar.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_17.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_17.text: They were attacking who you were. I never found it funny, but wasn't quite sure why. Eventually I realised it was because I wasn't happy with who I was.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_8.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_8.text: I couldn't keep going like that. But seeing how you fought on, I realised that I didn't have to. From then on, I was Nocturne. It wasn't easy... but everything started to make sense. I could breathe.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_42.speaker: Shadowheart
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_42.text: It's a beautiful name. Suits you well.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_61.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_61.text: Thank you. Picked it myself. But enough of that - I can't believe you're back.
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_61.context: NodeContext: Lighthearted. Flyby reference to their pronouns on 'I'm them'.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_38.speaker: Shadowheart
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_38.text: I've been trying to return here as long as I can remember... which admittedly doesn't amount to much.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_70.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_70.text: They... they whispered it was a suicide mission, this search for the artefact you were sent on.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_63.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_63.text: Some even thought it was the Mother Superior's plan alone, and not Lady Shar's intent...

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_6.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_6.text: It seems the whispers were right on that last part, my lady. At some point she confused her ambitions for the Nightsinger's will.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_68.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_68.text: But no matter - you rule us now. What comes next?
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_68.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart gives a questioning glance to the player after Nightshade speaks ('what DOES come next?')

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_24.speaker: Player
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_24.text: Viconia is defeated. It's up to you what happens to her followers.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_20.speaker: Shadowheart
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_20.text: Her followers... and my friends, in at least some cases. I was so focused on getting here, on finishing this, I forgot about the life I had here.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_13.speaker: Player
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_13.text: You command this place now, Shadowheart. What happens is your choice.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_26.speaker: Shadowheart
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_26.text: I wish... to know more. There must be all sort of things you can tell me. Little things from my past, lost to Lady Shar's embrace.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_59.speaker: Player
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_59.text: I didn't see her amongst your supporters fighting Viconia. You shouldn't trust her.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_67.speaker: Shadowheart
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_67.text: Perhaps you're right... but I trusted her once. That has to count for something.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_48.speaker: Shadowheart
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_48.text: There must be all sorts you can tell me. Things I can't even remember.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_66.speaker: Player
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_66.text: She's one of them. You can't trust her.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_12.speaker: Player
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_12.text: I expect you'll have catching-up to do.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_5.speaker: Shadowheart
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_5.text: Indeed. There must be all sorts of things you could tell me.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_31.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_31.text: There are... but you need to finish what you came here for. Everyone knows you've been blessed, that you're coming for the Mother Superior. I won't stand in your way.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_4.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_4.text: Still, we need to be careful... The Mother Superior holds a tight grip on this place. But perhaps I can help you in the meanwhile.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_54.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_54.text: Come see me when you have time - I work as quartermaster now. I can sell you some things... and we can catch up.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_55.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_55.text: If you wish it of me... of course, my lady. I work as the quartermaster. Come see me whenever you wish.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_52.speaker: Shadowheart
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_52.text: Indeed. There must be all sorts of things you could tell me.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_65.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_65.text: There are... but you need to finish what you came here for. If half of the rumours about what was done to you are true... well, I won't stand in your way.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_60.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_60.text: Still, we need to be careful... The Mother Superior holds a tight grip on this place. But perhaps I can help you in the meanwhile.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_27.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_27.text: Come see me when you have time - I work as quartermaster now. I can sell you some things... and we can catch up.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_58.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_58.text: There are... but with the Mother Superior gone, I don't know if I can stay here to reminisce. Perhaps there's another enclave out there for me.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_30.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_30.text: You don't, perhaps. Not everyone is as brave.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_62.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_62.text: I'll leave come tomorrow. Come see me before then - I was working as quartermaster. I can sell you some things to aid you... and we can catch up.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_25.speaker: Player
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_25.text: You can reminisce after you've dealt with Viconia, Shadowheart.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_47.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_47.text: You're right. I need to finish this.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_23.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_23.text: I'll need to be careful... The Mother Superior holds a tight grip on this place. But perhaps I can help you in the meanwhile.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_19.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_19.text: It seems the whispers were right, on that last part. At some point she confused her ambitions for the Nightsinger's will.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_41.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_41.text: Be careful... Whatever she has planned, I don't think she'll shed any tears if you are a casualty along the way.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_44.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_44.text: But now it seems you've turned on both the Mother Superior and Lady Shar...

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_46.speaker: Shadowheart
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_46.context: NodeContext: A touch suspicious - greeted warmly by someone she doesn't remember.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_16.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_16.text: We... we trained together. We used to be close.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_51.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_51.text: I'm glad to see you're all right.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_56.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_56.text: Ah... a pity. Perhaps we can talk some more later. That is, if you wish, my lady.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_3.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_3.text: Ah... a pity. Perhaps we can talk some more later, if you wish.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_7.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_7.text: They said the hunt for the artefact was a suicide mission - I feared I wouldn't see you again. Some even thought it was the Mother Superior's plan alone, and not what Lady Shar wanted...

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_69.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_69.text: Ah... a pity. Perhaps we can talk some more later, if you wish.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_32.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_32.text: Ah... a pity. Perhaps we can talk some more later. That is, if you're not about to turn on me... It seems you no longer walk in the Dark Lady's shadow.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_1.speaker: Player
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_1.text: Then you two are enemies - not friends.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_18.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_18.text: Not if Shadowheart doesn't wish for it. She helped me be true to myself - I will not begrudge her for doing the same... even if it displeases Lady Shar.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_50.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_50.text: Not if Shadowheart doesn't wish for it. She may not remember, but we shared a lot together once. Good times, hard times... I will not turn on her. Even if it angers Lady Shar.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_35.speaker: Shadowheart
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_35.text: Shar condemned me. By her decree, you and I are enemies.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_10.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_10.text: Only if you wish us to be. You helped me be true to myself - I will not begrudge you for discovering yourself... even if it displeases Lady Shar.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_37.speaker: Shadowheart
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_37.text: That's... good enough for me. I'm not sure what I expected coming back to this place - certainly not a friend.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_53.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_COM_53.text: Only if you wish us to be. You may not remember, but we shared a lot together once. Good times, hard times... I will not turn on you. Even if it angers Lady Shar.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_5.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_5.text: Finish it. Send me to Lady Shar's embrace.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_4.speaker: Shadowheart
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_4.text: She still has answers I need.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_25.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_25.text: So blunt - have you forgotten all the interrogation techniques I taught you? Where is the finesse?

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_28.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_28.text: They are right through that door, in the Chamber of Loss. Where they have been all along. You saw them many times, only we made you forget. But they didn't forget.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_56.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_56.text: They watched, as we moulded you. They watched. They wept. They bled - often at your hand. It may not be a happy reunion, but it will be a memorable one.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_8.speaker: Player
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_8.text: She's just trying to rile you up.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_43.speaker: Shadowheart
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_43.text: I know. But she's not lying. She made me in her image.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_21.speaker: Player
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_21.text: This is a waste of time. Kill her.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_0.speaker: Shadowheart
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_0.text: No, you should keep them talking as long as you can, then you kill them. She taught me that.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_44.speaker: Shadowheart
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_44.text: Why? Why me? Why all this effort?

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_12.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_12.text: Lady Shar commanded me. And I obeyed. I do not question - I merely act as she wills me to.
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_12.context: NodeContext: Resignation. 'Those were my orders. That's that'

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_45.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_45.text: I had an enclave in Waterdeep, you know. Much grander than this. Shar ordered me to raze it, kill all who followed me - claim they betrayed me, when in fact I slew those who showed nothing but loyalty.
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_45.context: NodeContext: Bitterness creeping in. 'I had it all, and was forced to sacrifice it'

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_7.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_7.text: Shar had me do that, and I did. To cover my tracks. To usher in you.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_54.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_54.text: You became my mission. To take a child of Selûne's, and turn her over to Lady Shar. To show that all light fades, and darkness will prevail in the end.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_10.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_10.text: All this was to make you into what the Dark Lady needed you to be - the planning. The training. Those deaths in Waterdeep. It was all to groom you to replace me at her right hand side. And still, you threw it away.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_14.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_14.text: Sympathy is for the weak. I merely wanted to say my piece. I wanted her to know the cost of her education. Now do what you will.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_58.speaker: Player
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_58.text: What do you want to do, Shadowheart?

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_2.speaker: Shadowheart
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_2.text: I want to see my parents. And I don't care what happens to this one. She's been in my head long enough already. Do what you like. I know you'll choose well.
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_2.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Shadowheart addresses Player, steps away from Viconia

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_34.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_34.text: What are you doing? Come back and finish this yourself! You owe me that!

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_13.speaker: Shadowheart
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_13.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart glances back at Viconia

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_46.speaker: Jaheira
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_46.text: She stands at the same crossroads you yourself once did, Viconia - but it seems you are not quite the teacher you thought.
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_46.context: NodeContext: Watching Shadowheart walk off and leave Viconia to our mercy, satisfied that Shar has not won

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_48.speaker: Minsc
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_48.text: Boo thinks you have had every chance to change your ways. Count yourself blessed it is not he who judges you today.
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_48.context: NodeContext: Distaste, looking down on a defeated Viconia

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_20.speaker: Player
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_20.text: Go. If you're wise, you'll vanish.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_41.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_41.text: I am adept at it. Aluve.
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_41.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia gets to her feet and leaves. (Include standing up, but dont worry about her leaving.)NodeContext: ah-LOO-veh ('I leave you')

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_59.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_59.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player strikes. Viconia speaks to her goddess with her last breath, and falls back, dead.NodeContext: Spoken to her deity in her moment of death

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_51.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_51.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player strikes. Viconia speaks to her goddess with her last breath, and falls back, dead.NodeContext: Spoken to her deity in her moment of death

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_11.speaker: Player
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_11.text: She's no threat anymore. Let her go.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_42.speaker: Shadowheart
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_42.text: I doubt Shar will look too kindly on her failure - we all know how she treats those who disappoint her.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_55.speaker: Shadowheart
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_55.text: Go. Vanish as if you were dead.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_29.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_29.text: The Dark Lady was wrong about you, girl. Too much kindness lurks in your heart. Aluve.
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_29.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia gets to her feet and leaves. (Include standing up, but dont worry about her leaving.)NodeContext: Veiled insult ('you're too soft') ah-LOO-veh ('I leave you')

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_17.speaker: Player
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_17.text: Kill her. Be done with this.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_57.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_57.text: Yes. Do it. Her embrace awaits me.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_27.speaker: Shadowheart
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_27.text: She doesn't care about any of us.
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_27.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Shadowheart strikes at Viconia immediately after her line, killing her.NodeContext: Cold

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_38.speaker: Player
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_38.text: No, Shadowheart. We've won. You don't need anything from her.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_36.speaker: Shadowheart
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_36.text: You deal with her then. I need to find my parents.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_53.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_53.text: Careful, girl. You may not like what you find.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_39.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_39.text: So you think you have won? Time will tell - far easier to claim something than hold onto it.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_52.speaker: Viconia DeVir
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_52.text: They will turn on you, in time. When you hear the whispers, and see the blades drawn, remember my face.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_1.speaker: Shadowheart
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_1.text: I won't remember you at all. Nobody will.

ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_18.speaker: Shadowheart
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_18.text: Kill her, or turn her loose. It doesn't matter. She's finished, either way.
ViconiaDefeated_OM_Shadowheart_COM_18.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to the playerNodeContext: Spoken to the player re: Viconia. Matter-of-fact

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_59.speaker: Narrator
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_59.text: *This seems to be the person from the memory recovered by eating the noblestalk - but changed, and with a different name.*

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_73.speaker: Shadowheart
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_73.text: I... I remember you. But you're different. Very different. And that name is new.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_56.speaker: Shadowheart
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_56.text: Most would consider us enemies, not friends.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_87.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_87.text: Shadowheart... I wasn't sure if I'd ever lay eyes on you again. It's me, Nocturne. Do you remember?

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_9.speaker: Narrator
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_9.text: *You recall the memory you recovered by eating the noblestalk - part of you understands that this is the same person you saw, but different, and with a new name.*

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_94.speaker: Shadowheart
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_94.text: I... I remember you. But you're different. Very different. And that name is new.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_24.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_24.text: Not that new. You inspired me to do it, actually.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_49.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_49.text: I remember the other initiates used to tease you about your name - the one you chose to honour Lady Shar. But I never found it funny...

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_86.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_86.text: They were attacking who you were. I never found it funny, but wasn't quite sure why. Eventually I realised it was because I wasn't happy with who I was.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_98.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_98.text: I couldn't keep going like that. But seeing how you fought on, I realised that I didn't have to. From then on, I was Nocturne. It wasn't easy... but everything started to make sense. I could breathe.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_32.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_32.text: Not as glad as I am.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_57.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_57.text: But enough of that - I can't believe you're back.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_64.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_64.text: They... they whispered it was a suicide mission, this search for the artefact you were sent on. Some even thought it was the Mother Superior's plan alone, and not what Lady Shar wanted...

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_23.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_23.text: It seems the whispers were right on that last part, my lady. At some point she confused her ambitions for the Nightsinger's will.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_44.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_44.text: But no matter - you rule us now. What comes next?

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_47.speaker: Shadowheart
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_47.text: What comes next? My rule over this place. You will resume your duties.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_29.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_29.text: I serve as quartermaster - see me whenever you seek supplies. And perhaps we could catch up... If you wish, of course.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_82.speaker: Shadowheart
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_82.text: Viconia's gone, and this place can rot as far as I'm concerned. You should leave.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_26.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_26.text: She is gone, but the Dark Lady is always with me. Perhaps there's another enclave out there for me.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_77.speaker: Shadowheart
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_77.text: What comes next? The Chamber of Loss. Viconia is gone, and soon I will rule.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_92.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_92.text: Then you are more than a friend - you are soon to be my leader, my lady.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_84.speaker: Shadowheart
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_84.text: I did not see you amongst my supporters when I faced Viconia - can I trust you?

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_12.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_12.text: Of course. I am just a quartermaster - I would have been little use to you in battle.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_80.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_80.text: But at least my wares can still aid you. Come to me whenever you need supplies... and perhaps we can catch up as well.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_36.speaker: Shadowheart
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_36.text: Most would consider us enemies, not friends.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_34.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_34.text: Most, but not me. You may not remember, but we shared a lot together once. Good times, hard times... I will not turn on you. Even if it angers Lady Shar.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_8.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_8.text: But I can imagine that is hard to believe. Give me a day, and I'll leave here. You'll never be troubled by me again.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_70.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_70.text: Come see me before then, if you wish. I was working as quartermaster. I can sell you some things to aid you... and we can catch up.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_74.speaker: Shadowheart
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_74.text: If we were - are - friends, there must be all sorts of things you could tell me.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_22.speaker: Nocturne
