FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_22.text: There are... but you need to finish what you came here for. Everyone knows you've been blessed, that you're coming for the Mother Superior. I won't stand in your way.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_11.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_11.text: Still, we need to be careful... The Mother Superior holds a tight grip on this place. But perhaps I can help you in the meanwhile.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_75.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_75.text: Come see me when you have time - I work as quartermaster now. I can sell you some things... and we can catch up.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_37.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_37.text: If you wish it of me... of course. I work as the quartermaster. Come see me whenever you wish.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_3.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_3.text: There are... but you need to finish what you came here for. If half of the rumours about what was done to you are true... well, I won't stand in your way.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_61.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_61.text: Still, we need to be careful... The Mother Superior holds a tight grip on this place. But perhaps I can help you in the meanwhile.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_15.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_15.text: Come see me when you have time - I work as quartermaster now. I can sell you some things... and we can catch up.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_5.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_5.text: There are... but with the Mother Superior gone, I don't know if I can stay here to reminisce. Perhaps there's another enclave out there for me.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_62.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_62.text: You may be free of the Dark Lady, but not everyone is as brave. I'm afraid.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_43.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_43.text: I'll leave come tomorrow. Come see me before then - I was working as quartermaster. I can sell you some things to aid you... and we can catch up.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_42.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_42.text: It seems the whispers were right, on that last part. At some point she confused her ambitions for the Nightsinger's will.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_85.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_85.text: Be careful... Whatever she has planned, I don't think she'll shed any tears if you were a casualty along the way.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_99.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_99.text: Perhaps I can aid you all the same - it seems the Dark Lady holds you in high favour.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_45.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_45.text: But now it seems you've turned on both the Mother Superior and Lady Shar...

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_48.speaker: Shadowheart
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_48.text: Most would consider us enemies, not friends.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_90.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_90.text: Every way you can imagine. Scorn, indifference, acceptance, confusion. Some tried to taunt me, attack me... but luckily I learned a few tricks from you about how to handle them.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_27.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_27.text: I must give the Mother Superior due credit, though. She accepted it with a nod. 'The Dark Lady guides us all,' she said. 'We find our true selves in her embrace.'

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_65.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_65.text: Do I detect a trace of scepticism? I know it might be hard to believe, but you can find acceptance in the unlikeliest of places.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_21.speaker: Shadowheart
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_21.text: Perhaps she was telling you what you wanted to hear. To keep you bound to Shar.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_17.speaker: Shadowheart
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_17.text: Perhaps she was telling you what you wanted to hear. To keep you in Lady Shar's embrace.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_31.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_31.text: It's possible - don't think I haven't considered it. But to find a home, to find acceptance for who I am... that is no small thing.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_53.speaker: Shadowheart
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_53.text: Shar is evil. She ruins lives. The acceptance of her disciple is nothing worth cherishing.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_7.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_7.text: I am under no illusions about the nature of our creed. But to find a home, to find acceptance for who I am... that is no small thing.
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_7.context: NodeContext: A little tough. 'you don't need to explain the sky's blue'

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_71.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_71.text: I do not wish to argue the point. I'm too glad to see you for that.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_93.speaker: Shadowheart
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_93.text: I remember none of this - or at least, almost none of it.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_100.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_100.text: I understand. Allow me to remember for the both of us - it changed my life for the better.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_55.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_55.text: We... we trained together. We used to be close.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_19.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_19.text: I'm glad to see you're all right, even if you don't remember me.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_14.speaker: Shadowheart
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_14.text: Nocturne? Can't say I know you. Interesting name, though.

FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_63.speaker: Nocturne
FamiliarFace_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_63.text: I keep forgetting how little you must remember - you inspired the name, actually.
